name: Etherian
description: Traverse the fractured scapes to test your skills, uncover the stories of the ancients, or explore the mystical world around you in search of secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel i7 6500k equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or equivalent
